definitions.definition: Any of two species (and hybrids ) of tropical fish of the genus Xiphophorus (which also includes the swordtails ).
examples: I had a mixed community aquarium with several tetras, two mollies, some corydoras catfish, and a platy from a previous tank.

main_definition: Any of two species (and hybrids ) of tropical fish of the genus Xiphophorus (which also includes the swordtails ).
